summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: the /age-calculator TOOL_SEO title/description were updated in seo.ts, and the Age Calculator page H1/title plus the intro paragraph copy were set on the page via ToolShell props. Two additional modified files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) are not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested SEO copy changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for SEO text updates in Age Calculator page and seo metadata; it does not request updates to project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository documentation/summary file (frontend-file-summaries.txt) unrelated to the requested SEO copy changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summaries; only specifies updates to seo.ts and AgeCalculatorPage.tsx content.
